title: vENa selvam
sahitya:
vENa selvam eidi vAzhgavE ingE vIra dhIra sUrar shUzhgavE


anupallavi

  ANUm peNNum kANum ulagil anbu kUDi inbamAga


caraNam    arivum tozhilum amainda selvam Atma jnAna pUtta selvam
neriyil vAzhum nErmai selvam nilavum pugazhOD-ulavum selvam
shevi selvam kavi selvam tava selvam shiva selvam
